Text: Very cool.  One of the greatest rock bands of all time.  Great sound.  I remember a time when I was smokin a bowl in my best friends basement and listening to these guys.  Lets see..  that was 1973.   Thank You!
My First Album of this Band is "Wheatfield Soul " it's an LP Record thanks for ups of this Classic Selection
alright! smokin a bowl and listening to "These Eyes" is just as awesome as it sounds, kick ass mr. 1973!

I agree! Thanks for this great album, Apeface! Really appreciate those liner notes, too; that's crazy how they got their name, never knew that! (Anyone know where to find a torrent of Wheatfield Soul? - their first (and best, I think) album?)
I am gonna seed this for fucking ever. You just made my day sir. Thank you
I had the good fortune to see BTO open for The Guess Who @ a night club in San Diego in 1983; Randy Bachman played both shows...it was incredible!
